goldens.input: I forgot my password, what should I do?
goldens.expected_output: You can reset your password by clicking 'Forgot Password' on the login page. A reset link will be sent to your registered email within 5 minutes.

goldens.input: How long until my password reset link expires?
goldens.expected_output: The password reset link expires after 24 hours.

goldens.input: I am not satisfied with my purchase, can I get a refund?
goldens.expected_output: Yes, we have a 30-day money-back guarantee on all purchases. Your refund will be processed within 5-7 business days.

goldens.input: How long does standard shipping take?
goldens.expected_output: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days.

goldens.input: What is the cost for express shipping?
goldens.expected_output: Express shipping costs $15.

goldens.input: How can I delete my account?
goldens.expected_output: You can delete your account from Settings > Privacy > Delete Account. This will require email confirmation.

goldens.input: When are your business hours?
goldens.expected_output: Our business hours are Monday-Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM EST, and Saturday from 10 AM - 4 PM EST. We are closed on Sunday.

goldens.input: I requested a refund, when will I get my money back?
goldens.expected_output: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days and credited back to your original payment method.

goldens.input: I want to delete my account, but what happens to my data?
goldens.expected_output: After email confirmation, your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days. However, your order history will be retained for legal compliance.

goldens.input: I placed an order on Sunday, when will it ship?
goldens.expected_output: As our business is closed on Sundays, your order will be processed on the next business day, which is Monday.

goldens.input: I bought an item but I used a wrong email, can I still reset my password?
goldens.expected_output: The reset link can only be sent to the registered email. Please register or change your account with your correct email.

goldens.input: I got my refund but the shipping cost was not included, why is that?
goldens.expected_output: Shipping costs are non-refundable as per our refund policy.

goldens.input: I need my order to arrive within 2 days, what should I do?
goldens.expected_output: You should choose express shipping at checkout. This service costs $15 and takes 1-2 business days.

goldens.input: I requested to delete my account, but I want to cancel my request, is that possible?
goldens.expected_output: Once the account deletion process has been initiated and confirmed via email, it cannot be cancelled. Your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days.

goldens.input: I want to order a product, but I live outside the US. How much will the shipping cost?
goldens.expected_output: International shipping costs $25.

goldens.input: I want to return my purchase which I bought 31 days ago, can I still get a refund?
goldens.expected_output: No, as per our refund policy, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all purchases. Hence, you cannot get a refund for your purchase.

goldens.input: What happens to my order history after I delete my account?
goldens.expected_output: Your order history will be retained for legal compliance even after your account is deleted.

goldens.input: I ordered a product with express shipping on Friday at 7 PM, when will it arrive?
goldens.expected_output: As our business hours end at 6 PM EST, your order will be processed on the next business day, which is Saturday. With express shipping, your order should arrive by Monday at the latest.

goldens.input: Do I get free shipping if my order is over $50?
goldens.expected_output: Yes, we offer free standard shipping on orders over $50.

goldens.input: What if I don't get the password reset link within 5 minutes?
goldens.expected_output: Please ensure to check your spam folder. If you still haven't received it, you may want to request again or contact our customer support.
